Retail and E-commerce

We deliver end-to-end customer services for e-commerce and retail companies, constantly improve customer loyalty, ensure sales growth and operational efficiency in every aspect.

A huge e-commerce industry collects the mountain of big data - from the moment the product leaves the manufacturer, to its purchase. This is an areawhere analytics could significantly raise the operating margins. With wide experience and full range of software and support services, Copler helps retailers to achieve maximum efficiency in every department.

See real results

    • Improve efficiency
    • Increase marketing ROI
    • Increase customer loyalty
    • Target advertising
    • Recommendation engine
    • Behavior analysis
    • Same day delivery
    • Bots and virtual assistance
    • Customer Care
    • Telemarketing
    • Target advertising
    • Behavior Analytics
    • Ongoing support of real-time operations
    • Support of IT infrastructure
    • On-shelf availability
